allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement complete authentication system and core app features

- Add authentication flow with Supabase \(login, register, forgot password, welcome\)
- Implement onboarding screens with role-based navigation
- Create provider dashboard with statistics and overview
- Add provider profile page with details and booking functionality
- Implement real-time chat with Supabase Realtime
- Add reusable UI components \(Button, Input\)
- Set up state management with Zustand \(auth store, app store\)
- Configure React Query for data fetching
- Add utility functions \(date/price formatting, validation\)
- Set up TypeScript types aligned with Supabase database
- Install missing dependencies \(lucide-react-native, expo-linear-gradient\)
- Fix navigation routes and AuthGuard logic

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
